  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/111942</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111942</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Čebelarstvo - naravoslovni dan</string>
            <string language="en">Beekeeping - natural science day</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beekeeping - natürlicher Wissenschaft Tag</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'apiculture - jour normal de la science</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Beekeeping - dia natural da ciência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Beekeeping - giorno naturale di scienza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μελισσοκομία - ημέρα φυσικής επιστήμης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Apicultura - día natural de la ciencia</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Gradivo za naravoslovni dan zajema organizacijo, cilje, potek, vsebinsko pripravo in učne liste za učence 1. razreda. Zbrani podatki in slike o čebelah (različni internetni viri, navedeni v pripravi) lahko koristijo tudi drugim, ki jih tema zanima.</string>
            <string language="en">Materials that can be used to organize and teach about bees and beekeeping.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">čebelarstvo</string>
            <string language="en">beekeeping</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">čebela</string>
            <string language="en">bee</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">med</string>
            <string language="en">honey</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Materialien, die benutzt werden können, um über 
Bienen und Beekeeping zu organisieren und zu unterrichten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Matériaux qui peuvent être employés pour 
organiser et enseigner au sujet des abeilles et de l'apiculture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Materiais que podem ser usados organizar e ensinar 
sobre abelhas e beekeeping.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Materiali che possono essere usati per organizzare 
ed insegnare circa le api ed il beekeeping.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υλικά που μπορούν να χρησιμοποιηθούν για να οργανώσουν
και να διδάξουν για τις μέλισσες και τη μελισσοκομία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Materiales que se pueden utilizar para ordenar y 
para enseñar sobre abejas y apicultura.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beekeeping</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Honig</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'apiculture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">abeille</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">miele</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">apicultura</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">abeja</string>
